segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the boy precariously balanced on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping backwards at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high into that cookie jar, completely focused on the sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is also reaching, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so absorbed in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the danger of him falling is just so evident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash if he loses his balance!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so close, yet so far away in her awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She truly has no idea what is happening just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me incredibly anxious to watch this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to warn them, but I can only observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
